name: Bioenergy Conference
content: Bioenergy Congress has been contributing successfully to the global scientific research field. 16th World Bioenergy Congress and Expo were held during October 12-13, 2020 at Zurich, Switzerland with the theme â€œFuture Outlook and New Era Technologies in Bioenergy". Active participation of Scientists, Engineers, Researchers, Students and Leaders from the fields of Bioenergy, Biomass, Renewable Energy is highly appreciated and made this event a blast.
